bill.title: An Act To Implement the Recommendations of the Criminal Law Advisory Commission Relative to the Maine Criminal Code and Related Statutes
bill.description: An Act To Implement the Recommendations of the Criminal Law Advisory Commission Relative to the Maine Criminal Code and Related Statutes

history.action: (H) Representative PLUMMER for the Criminal Law Advisory Commission pursuant to the Maine Revised Statutes, Title 17-A, section 1354, subsection 2, reports that the Bill be REFERRED to the Committee on CRIMINAL JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY and printed pursuant to Joint Rule 218.
(H) Report was READ and ACCEPTED.
(H) The Bill was REFERRED to the Committee on CRIMINAL JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY and ordered printed pursuant to Joint Rule 218.
(H) Sent for concurrence. ORDERED SENT FORTHWITH.

(S) Under suspension of the Rules Report READ and ACCEPTED in concurrence On motion by Senator Mason of Androscoggin REFERRED to the Committee on CRIMINAL JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY and ordered printed pursuant to Joint Rule 218 in concurrence
(H) CONSENT CALENDAR - FIRST DAY
(H) Under suspension of the rules
(H) CONSENT CALENDAR - SECOND DAY.
(H) The Bill was PASSED TO BE ENGROSSED as Amended by Committee Amendment "A" (H-618)
(H) Sent for concurrence. ORDERED SENT FORTHWITH.
(S) Under suspension of the Rules Report READ and ACCEPTED in concurrence READ ONCE Committee Amendment "A" (H-618) READ and ADOPTED in concurrence
(S) Under suspension of the Rules, READ A SECOND TIME  PASSED TO BE ENGROSSED AS AMENDED BY Committee Amendment "A" (H-618) in concurrence
(H) PASSED TO BE ENACTED.
(H) Sent for concurrence. ORDERED SENT FORTHWITH.
(S) Under suspension of the Rules On motion by Senator ROSEN of Hancock PLACED ON THE SPECIAL APPROPRIATIONS TABLE pending ENACTMENT in concurrence
(S) On motion by Senator ROSEN of Hancock TAKEN FROM THE SPECIAL APPROPRIATIONS TABLE
(S) On further motion by Same Senator Under suspension of the Rules RECONSIDERED  PASSAGE TO BE ENGROSSED AS AMENDED BY Committee Amendment "A" (H-618) in concurrence
(S) On further motion by Same Senator Under further suspension of the Rules RECONSIDERED ADOPTION of Committee Amendment "A" (H-618)
(S) On further motion by Same Senator Senate Amendment "A" (S-360) to Committee Amendment "A" (H-618) READ and ADOPTED
(S) Committee Amendment "A" (H-618) As Amended By Senate Amendment "A" (S-360) thereto ADOPTED In NON-CONCURRENCE
(S) PASSED TO BE ENGROSSED AS AMENDED BY Committee Amendment "A" (H-618) AS AMENDED BY  Senate Amendment "A" (S-360) thereto In NON-CONCURRENCE
(S) Ordered sent down forthwith for concurrence
(H) The House RECEDED and CONCURRED to PASSAGE TO BE ENGROSSED as Amended by Committee Amendment "A" (H-618) as Amended by Senate Amendment "A" (S-360) thereto
(H) ORDERED SENT FORTHWITH.
(H) PASSED TO BE ENACTED.
(H) Sent for concurrence. ORDERED SENT FORTHWITH.
(S) Under suspension of the Rules PASSED TO BE ENACTED in concurrence
